      "```python\n\nimport sys\nimport uvicorn\nfrom fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException\n```"

    "Define an instance of the FastAPI app and create routes with endpoints:",

      "```python\napp = FastAPI()\ndef get_items():\n    return {'items': ['Item 1', 'Item 2', 'Item 3']}\n@app.get('/items/')\ndef index():\n    return get_items()\n@app.get('/items/{item_id}')\ndef read_item(item_id: int):\n    if item_id not in get_items():\n        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail='Item not found')\n    return {'item': get_items()[item_id]}```"

    "To run the FastAPI app locally (Uvicorn is recommended as a production-ready ASGI server):",

      "```bash\n$ uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000\n```"

    "You can now test your API at http://localhost:8000/items/"
